game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient scrolls hidden within the ruins of Eldarath.
game.description: The city of Eldarath has been lost to the sands of time, but its secrets remain. Retrieve the ancient scrolls and unlock the mysteries of this forgotten civilization.
game.reward: Ancient Scroll of Knowledge, 1000 Gold Coins

tasks.description: Venture into the heart of the desert and locate the entrance to the ancient city.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the Scrolls from the Central Chamber
tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous tunnels and chambers to reach the central room where the scrolls are kept.
Bring the ancient scrolls back to Thorgrim and claim your reward.
